basics.name: Srividhya Chandrasekharan
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I build scalable, high-performance backend systems that power seamless digital experiences. My technical expertise includes Java, Python, and Kubernetes. I am a Certified Kubernetes Application Developer and a Certified Kubernetes Administrator.

work.summary: Iâ€™ve contributed to high-impact projects that shape the future of global communication.
highlights: Java Backend Engineer: In my first role, I developed and optimized a containerized customer support web application, supporting over 150 global deployments and managing 1+ billion devices, ensuring high availability and seamless customer experiences across diverse regions.

Cloud Native Software Engineer: In my second role, I contributed to transforming a legacy monolithic application into a scalable cloud-based solution, supporting a $120M revenue-generating product for 500M+ devices on major global 4G & 5G networks, including North America, Japan, and Europe.
Taught a class of 40 students CSE 1222: Introduction to Computer Programming in C++.
Administered lab sessions, evaluated their homework, lab and quiz submissions.
Maintained weekly office hours and problem-solving sessions.
Administered and graded midterm and final exams.

volunteer.summary: Dog Enrichment Volunteer for large dogs.
highlights: I walked large dogs to give them a break from the stressful shelter environment. Each walk was not just about exercise; it was about building trust and companionship, allowing these dogs to feel loved and valued. My mission was to create joyful moments for these furry friends, focusing on engaging playtime and rewarding their positive behaviors with endless belly rubs and affectionate scratches.
